content.rendered:
Exceeded in number of luggage:

– From 25% discount by booking more than 24 hours of departure, or your extra baggage allowance to 75 €! Learn more about Xtra BAG

– Package of 100 € for the additional baggage, less than 24 hours before departure.

 XTRA BAG, buy your luggage at light Xtra prices
Max. Baggage allowance: 3 pieces of luggage allowed

* , including deductible (1 in the deductible + 2 maximum baggage)
* Subject to acceptance, according to the capacity in the hold on the day of departure.

 Book Online

 

  • Exceeding in weight on the transatlantic network:taxation of 50 € in excess of the authorized 23kg and up to a limit of 32 kg per piece of luggage.

REGIONAL NETWORK

 

REGIONAL NETWORK

(Fort-de-France, Saint-Martin, Pointe-à-Pitre, Saint Lucia, Santo Domingo)
Simply rates Flexible rates FLEXILPRO rates Rates Subscribers
1 st luggage in the hold of 23kg 15 € more than 48h before departure
20 € less than 48h before departure		 1 luggage included A total of 30 kg can be divided into 2 separate luggage A total of 30 kg can be divided into 2 separate luggage
Additional baggage in the hold (up to a limit of 23kg per luggage) 20 €  ( 2nd room and more) 20 €  ( 2nd room and more) 20 € 20 €
Overweight charge Package 10 €  in the limit of 30 kg max the luggage Package 10 €  in the limit of 30 kg max the luggage Package 10 €  in the limit of 30 kg max the luggage Package 10 €  in the limit of 30 kg max the luggage

 

 

For more details visit : http://www.aircaraibes.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Air Caraibes Hand | Cabin Baggage

Air Caraibes Checked Baggage
